title: Help identify the font in the picture
content:
Tell me what font in the picture

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [02.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418010729/http:/typophile.com/files/02_1.png) | 35.21 KB |
author: imexre

comments.content: Better to tell the OP that font ID requests should be made in the [**Font ID forum**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418010729/http:/typophile.com/typeid), and not in **Critique / Bitmap Text**.
You are absolutely right, Theunis. Unfortunately my RSS-reader shows me not the right board, just all.

Renko, just checked that and you're right. I'm not sure how RSS feeds are supposed to work; would it be a technical challenge to add in which forum a post appeared?

... Quite ironically, the top RSS post I get on checking is ...

> TYPE ID BOARD HAS MOVED! [7 AUG 2013]  
> Wednesday, August 07, 2013 23:28 PM
> 
> Please post your Font Identification requests to:  
> [http://typophile.com/fontid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418010729/http:/typophile.com/fontid "http://typophile.com/fontid").
